generalInfo:
Hurricane Technologies is a German based company which is working in different fields focusing on implementing new technologies for indoor air products.

Their main focus is on advanced Ozone technology which will help to eliminate unpleasant odors and to control air borne contamination outbreaks in various fields.

As a company with highly qualified professionals they have more than 50 years of experience in this field. Hurricane scientists, engineers and doctors are accredited on individual universities and laboratories around the globe, which helps them to gain the latest research studies and to implement those updates in their products development.

Hurricane philosophy is not only to sell a product but rather a complete solution for your problem.
typographyDescr: Open Sans is a humanist sans serif typeface designed by Steve Matteson, Type Director of Ascender Corp. Open Sans was designed with an upright stress, open forms and a neutral, yet friendly appearance. It was optimized for print, web, and mobile interfaces, and has excellent legibility characteristics in its letterforms.
creativeDescr:
PROJECT ASSIGNMENT: Design and develop: corp ID, business cards, brochures, flyers, posters, banners, stickers, 3D visualisation video, website.

PROJECT IMPLEMENTATION: The initial task was to create a basic company website. Yet in the past 2 years the website grew up to a corporate multilingual platform in 5 languages (English, German, Arabic, Japanese, Korean), with a lot of custom features like: galleries, youtube embedding, application forms, etc.

Since I started working with Hurricane Technologies I created for them a corp ID, more than 20 different types of brochures, flyers, stickers, banners, posters, corporate website and 3D Visualization video for one of their units (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=70lCMovA29Y)

PROJECT DEVELOPED BY: Asen Sokolov
